item.title: Cambricon Shares Tumble on Chip Rotation, Weighting Changes
item.description: Cambricon Technologies Corp. shares tumbled by the most in nearly five months on Thursday as investors rotated out of recent winners following its meteoric rise.

item.title: Cambricon Shares Tumble on Chip Rotation, Weighting Changes
item.description: Cambricon Technologies Corp. shares tumbled by the most in nearly five months on Thursday as investors rotated out of recent winners following its meteoric rise.

item.title: Cambricon’s Shares Dive 14% After Red-Hot China AI Rally Cools
item.description: Cambricon Technologies Corp. shares tumbled by the most in nearly eight months after investors cashed out of one of the more spectacular Chinese stock rallies of 2025.

item.title: Cambricon’s Shares Dive 14% After Red-Hot China AI Rally Cools
item.description: Cambricon Technologies Corp. shares tumbled by the most in nearly eight months after investors cashed out of one of the more spectacular Chinese stock rallies of 2025.

item.title: Cambricon Briefly Overtakes Moutai as China’s Priciest Stock
item.description: A leading Chinese chipmaker briefly replaced a top liquor giant as the country’s most expensive onshore stock, as investors doubled down on innovative technology firms to keep driving a broader rally.
